name: Bible Stories: Puzzles
description:
Solve a variety of slide puzzles depicting scenes from Bible stories. Once you’ve solved a puzzle, play again to see if you can beat your previous record!
Features:

• 7 Bible story scenes, including:

o The Good Samaritan
o The Lost Sheep
o The Wise and Foolish Builders
o The Net
o The Prodigal Son
o The Sower
o Wheat and Tares

• 4 challenge levels based on number of tiles in each scene:

o 3x3
o 4x4
o 5x5
o 8x8

• Tracks number of moves you make to complete each puzzle
• Timer tracks how long it takes you to complete each puzzle
• App keeps track of your record time and number of moves so that you can work to beat your record
• If you get stuck, you can reset the clock and the puzzle
• Press the eye icon to see the reference picture as you play
• Easily switch which puzzle you play
• Turn sound on or off
Perfect game for a personal challenge or to keep children busy and engaged with mind-stretching activities!
